Ghanem Zrelly (a mụrụ n'abalị  6, ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1984), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Thala My Love, Day of the Falcon, Beauty and the Dogs na In Paradox
N'afọ 2007, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Thirty
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke 'Habib Bourguiba'
N'afọ sochirinụ, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na usoro Njoum Ellil ma rụọ ọrụ 'Qais'. N'afọ 2009, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institut Superieur d' Art Dramatique na Tunisia.

N'afọ 2016, o ritere ihe nrite maka ọrụ nwoke kacha mma maka ọrụ ya 'Mehdi' na ihe nkiri Narcisse nke Sonia Chamkhi duziri n'oge mbipụta nke ise nke Maghrebian Film Festival nke a haziri na Oujda, Morocco.
N'afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri a ma ama Beauty and the Dogs ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Youssef'
Ihe nkiri ahụ malitere na Cannes Film Festival na ngalaba 'Un Certain Regard'.
